title: Claude Code Phase 1.5 Infrastructure Deployed

title: Claude Code Slash Commands - Complete Usage Guide
summary: Created comprehensive 617-line bilingual guide (Thai+English) explaining slash commands: (1) /feature-dev for plan-first feature development with SPEC.md output, (2) /code-review using subagents for multi-angle code review, (3) /deploy with checklist-driven deployment including backup and rollback. Guide includes: when to use each command, 6 real-world examples, decision tree, 3 recommended workflows, common pitfalls, customization tips, and comparison table. Location: docs/claude_code/SLASH_COMMANDS_GUIDE.md. Target audience: team members needing practical guidance on Claude Code Phase 1.5 features.

title: Claude Code Phase 1.5 - Fixed Directory Structure
summary: Corrected deployment using .cursor/ for commands/templates (Cursor-specific) and .claude/ for settings/context-map (cross-editor). Both directories now properly separated by purpose. All 3 slash commands (/feature-dev, /code-review, /deploy) now in .cursor/commands/ where Cursor can find them. Hooks, metrics, git wiring unchanged.
author: gg

title: Claude Code Directory Structure Explained
summary: Created comprehensive docs/claude_code/DIRECTORY_STRUCTURE.md explaining .claude/ vs .cursor/ separation. Both directories ARE used: .claude/ for cross-editor settings (settings.json, context-map.json) works everywhere, .cursor/ for Cursor-specific features (commands, templates) works in Cursor. Slash commands now in correct location (.cursor/commands/) where Cursor finds them. Answered 'why both' question - they serve complementary purposes, not conflicting ones.
